name: Pixel Fish
description: Pixel Fish is a fast-paced eater game starring a little orange fish named Sam. Sam doesn't know how or why he is in this hostile sea, but he has a strong suspicion that he doesn't belong. His only choice is to eat his way to the top of the food chain and learn the truth..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10 64 bit Storage: 150 MB available space
